description:
It`s been quite a few days since Natsuki first arrived and the fun and lively days continue. However, you start feeling anxious. Despite how pathetic you may feel, Natsuki always cheers you on. You then come to a decision...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momohara Natsuki Gets Embarrassed and Plays Things Off
桃原奈月は照れてごまかす
